name: Name
not_found_message: The page you are looking for does not exist.
home_description: This is the home page of our Golang course.
welcome_query_string: Welcome to the query strings page!
example_query_string: This is a sample page to show how a 'Query Strings' page would look like.
example_params: This is a sample page to show how a 'Parameters' page would look like.
validation_email: The :field must be a valid email address.
validation_min: The :field must be at least :min characters.
validation_max: The :field may not be greater than :max characters.
validation_between: The :field must be between :min and :max characters.
validation_alpha_num: The :field may only contain letters and numbers.
validation_required_if: The :field field is required when :other is :value.
validation_required_unless: The :field field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation_mimes: The :field must be a file of type: :values.
validation_max_size: The :field may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
validation_array_min: The :field must have at least :min items.
validation_array_max: The :field may not have more than :max items.
validation_url: The :field must be a valid URL.
validation_date: The :field must be a valid date.
validation_date_format: The :field does not match the format :format.
validation_max_numeric: The :field may not be greater than :max.
